thread.section_title: Gardner-White Furniture Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Gardner-White Furniture | www.gardner-white.com
thread.title: Robert Sanchez
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Robert Sanchez

author: Robert Sanchez
title: Robert Sanchez
text: Just 2 days ago our mattress arrived, the very next day after ordered, along with our free TV and the bed frame. Our sales man Ed did a wonderful job making a personable experience and showed us the many different mattresses. He also explained the process with financing and also gave us a free kitchenware set. The payments are low, manageable and I would come back to buy more furniture.
